data.title: bd-3cqv: protocol: ProtocolContext shared state collector

data.reason: Security review: No vulnerabilities. subprocess calls use Command::arg() (no shell injection vector). JSON parsing via serde with tolerant defaults. Agent/project parameters validated upstream. Subprocess stderr in errors is acceptable for agent-facing tooling. No input validation needed on bead_id/workspace/review_id since they're subprocess args, not shell-interpolated.
